      • getResource

        public ApplicationResource getResource(ApplicationResource base,
                                       Locale locale)
        Description copied from class: ServletApplicationContext
        Return a localized version of an ApplicationResource.
        Specified by:

        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        locale - the desired Locale.
